KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Matrix compareGT 007
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareEQ compareNE compareGE compareLT compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the compareGT function to compare two Matrices and return the Boolean value, true or false. The corresponding values of each Matrix are compared to determine whether one Matrix is greater than the other.

Syntax.Note:
The value of the first Matrix is greater than the value
of the second Matrix.

The value of the first Matrix is lesser than the value
of the second Matrix.
